tool_description: Get DNS record information for a specified domain.

api_list.name: Get DNS Records
api_list.description: Retrieve the DNS records for a given domain.

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: The domain name for which to retrieve DNS records.

optional_parameters.name: record_type
optional_parameters.description: Specify the type of DNS records to retrieve. Can be a comma-separated string with options: a, ns, mx, txt, cname. Example: a,mx,cname.

optional_parameters.name: response_type_seperator
optional_parameters.description: Defines the separator for the response when response_type is set to target. Default is newline, but can be set to comma or pipe.

optional_parameters.name: response_type
optional_parameters.description: Determines the format of the response. If set to target, it will return either ip, txt, or target of the requested DNS record type.
